Fri, 24 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Dunedin is grappling with a rising homeless population, with a tent encampment rising in a city park. Photo / File
Super Size Me film-maker Morgan Spurlock dies of cancer at 53 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/super-size-me-filmmaker-morgan-spurlock-dies-of-cancer-at-53/6AHQNPD3XNCGNEECPPHWKBQCEU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/super-size-me-filmmaker-morgan-spurlock-dies-of-cancer-at-53/6AHQNPD3XNCGNEECPPHWKBQCEU/ Spurlock illustrated the dangers of a fast-food diet in his Oscar-nominated 2004 film. Fri, 24 May 2024 21:19:07 +0000 Morgan Spurlock, an Oscar nominee who famously ate only at McDonald’s for a month to illustrate the dangers of a fast-food diet, has died. He was 53. Photo / AP
Auckland CBD shootings: How police believe gunman Matu Reid got a firearm without a licence https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-cbd-shootings-how-police- believe-gunman-matu-reid-got-a-firearm-without-a-licence/P3VPEBGBFVAS5HA4ZFW5TWN33U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-cbd-shootings-how-police- believe-gunman-matu-reid-got-a-firearm-without-a-licence/P3VPEBGBFVAS5HA4ZFW5TWN33U/ Jared Savage, Carolyne Meng-Yee, George BlockPolice investigation traces shotgun to legal sale just nine months before fatal shootings. Fri, 24 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Matu Reid killed two former workmates in shooting rampage in downtown Auckland in July 2023. Police believe they have traced the firearm he used and have charged two men with illegally supplying the gun on the black market. Photos / Hayden Woodward / Supplied
Tinder swindler: Kiwi divorcee loses $580k in 14-month romance scam after falling in love with US oil rig worker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ Lane NicholsThe victim was sent log in details to a fake UK bank account showing a balance of $3m. Fri, 24 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The scammer claimed he was a petroleum engineer named Scott Thomas working on an oil rig off the Canadian coast. However, the victim's family now believe the photos he sent and elaborate back story were all fake.
